profile.name: Charaf Eddine Charouit
profile.about:
I'm Charaf Eddine Charouit, a 21-year-old passionate about technology. 🔧🚀 I'm currently embarking on an exciting career transition that reflects my unwavering passion for continuous growth and adaptability. My journey began with a solid foundation in mechanical design, having studied mechanical engineering for two years. However, my true passion lies in web development 💻🌐, and I am in the process of navigating a transformative path into this dynamic field.

My decision to pivot into web development stems from my eagerness to explore new horizons and harness my analytical skills in a different domain. 🔍🌍 I am currently immersed in intensive studies within a full stack MERN bootcamp, where I am diligently building a versatile skill set encompassing both front-end and back-end development. 💡🛠️

This career transition, while unconventional, is underpinned by my deep commitment to innovation and problem-solving. 💪🌟 I am eager to embrace this challenge and leverage my unique background to make meaningful contributions in the ever-evolving world of technology. 👨‍💻🌐 I look forward to connecting with like-minded professionals and forging new opportunities for growth and collaboration in this exciting field. 🤝🚀
…see more

experiences.title: Full-stack Developer
experiences.description:
Joining Ark-X Academy was an amazing ride – from diving deep into the MERN stack to polishing up my soft skills, it's been quite the journey. Learning the ins and outs of MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js was a game-changer. But it wasn't just about the tech stuff. The program also helped me grow in how I communicate, collaborate, and handle whatever comes my way. The cherry on top was the job fair, where I got to flaunt my skills, connect with pros, and set sail into the next phase of my career. Ark-X Academy didn't just teach me tech; it turned me into a pro who's ready to rock in the ever-changing tech scene.

profile.name: Ismail HARIK
profile.about:
As a skilled computer science and software engineer developer, I have a strong passion for building innovative solutions and learning new technologies. With a solid foundation in Java programming, Spring Ecosystem, and Angular, I am well-equipped to design and develop robust and scalable applications that meet business requirements. I have hands-on experience in developing applications based on Microservices Architecture and utilizing technologies such as Spring Cloud, Docker, and Kubernetes.

Additionally, I have strong problem-solving and analytical skills that enable me to troubleshoot complex issues and optimize performance. My knowledge of SQL,NoSQl allows me to design efficient data models and manage large data sets.

Furthermore, I am a self-motivated and proactive individual with excellent communication and collaboration skills. I have volunteered in various projects and competitions, including the MNPC Contest and the national hackathon of ENSETM , where I honed my teamwork and time-management skills. As the Vice President and Co-Founder of the Computer and Engineering Club, I have organized conferences and competitions that promote knowledge-sharing and learning opportunities for students in IT fields.

experiences.title: Code Quality & Design Patterns Enthusiast
experiences.description:
Passionate about crafting high-quality code for robust software design, I share insights on code quality and design patterns through my blogs on Hashnode, aiming to contribute to a community of developers dedicated to excellence. I actively engage in in-depth research to deepen my understanding of complex software engineering topics. This approach not only enhances my knowledge but also allows me to better comprehend the subjects I discuss.

experiences.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer | Spring Boot, Angular, AWS
experiences.company: fondation des œuvres sociales de l'enseignement · Part-time
experiences.description:
💻 𝐒𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: Engineered a Spring Boot platform handling 18,000 monthly orders, transforming meal selection and order management.
🍴 𝐃𝐲𝐧𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐜 𝐌𝐞𝐧𝐮 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦: Implemented a customizable daily menu system, enabling managers to strategically plan weekly menus for customers. This feature allows managers to suggest meal orders, enhancing customer satisfaction. Additionally, it includes a deadline feature for each daily menu, post which customers cannot view or order from that day's menu, allowing managers to efficiently prepare meals based on confirmed orders.
💳 𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐏𝐚𝐲𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦: Established a robust payment system with budget adherence and traceable financial logs for user security.
📊 𝐔𝐬𝐞𝐫 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧: Developed dual user interfaces for administration/management and end-users, with features like balance checks, menus, and order tracking.
📈 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲: Enabled effective product choice management and supply chain operations for restaurant managers.
📉 𝐀𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐲𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐑𝐞𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠: Designed data tables for analyzing order trends, aiding in preparation and administrative efficiency.
🔧 𝑻𝒆𝒄𝒉 𝑺𝒕𝒂𝒄𝒌: Java 17, Spring Boot 3 LST, Angular 16 LST, Docker, AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, S3, EC2, CloudFront, Route53), MySQL, Angular Material, Node.js 18.12 LST.
𝐃𝐚𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐄𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: Optimized database structures by refining column configurations, resulting in improved data retrieval efficiency and performance.
𝐅𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐝 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲: Enhanced frontend performance by selectively minimizing Angular Material modules, 𝘚𝘵𝘢𝘯𝘥𝘢𝘭𝘰𝘯𝘦 𝘊𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘰𝘯𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘴, 𝘚𝘪𝘨𝘯𝘢𝘭𝘴, 𝘪𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘭𝘢𝘻𝘺 𝘭𝘰𝘢𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘶𝘵𝘪𝘭𝘪𝘻𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘨𝘻𝘪𝘱 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘴𝘪𝘰𝘯 for better load times.
💻 𝐒𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: Engineered a Spring Boot platform handling 18,000 monthly orders, transforming meal selection and order management. 🍴 𝐃𝐲𝐧𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐜 𝐌𝐞𝐧𝐮 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦: Implemented a customizable daily menu system, enabling managers to strategically plan weekly menus for customers. This feature allows managers to suggest meal orders, enhancing customer satisfaction. Additionally, it includes a deadline feature for each daily menu, post which customers cannot view or order from that day's menu, allowing managers to efficiently prepare meals based on confirmed orders. 💳 𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐏𝐚𝐲𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦: Established a robust payment system with budget adherence and traceable financial logs for user security. 📊 𝐔𝐬𝐞𝐫 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧: Developed dual user interfaces for administration/management and end-users, with features like balance checks, menus, and order tracking. 📈 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲: Enabled effective product choice management and supply chain operations for restaurant managers. 📉 𝐀𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐲𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐑𝐞𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠: Designed data tables for analyzing order trends, aiding in preparation and administrative efficiency. 🔧 𝑻𝒆𝒄𝒉 𝑺𝒕𝒂𝒄𝒌: Java 17, Spring Boot 3 LST, Angular 16 LST, Docker, AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, S3, EC2, CloudFront, Route53), MySQL, Angular Material, Node.js 18.12 LST. 𝐃𝐚𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐄𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: Optimized database structures by refining column configurations, resulting in improved data retrieval efficiency and performance. 𝐅𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐝 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲: Enhanced frontend performance by selectively minimizing Angular Material modules, 𝘚𝘵𝘢𝘯𝘥𝘢𝘭𝘰𝘯𝘦 𝘊𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘰𝘯𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘴, 𝘚𝘪𝘨𝘯𝘢𝘭𝘴, 𝘪𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘭𝘢𝘻𝘺 𝘭𝘰𝘢𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘶𝘵𝘪𝘭𝘪𝘻𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘨𝘻𝘪𝘱 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘴𝘪𝘰𝘯 for better load times.

experiences.title: A MODERN AND SECURE RENTAL CARS APPLICATION BASED ON MICROSERVICES ARCHITECTURE
experiences.description:
• Designed and implemented a microservices-based architecture that makes the application highly efficient, flexible, and resilient, allowing it to handle large volumes of traffic while maintaining an excellent user
experience.
• Created multiple search filters for users to find the ideal rental car, improving the application’s usability and convenience.
• Developed a dashboard that helps the owner easily manage resources and track rent evolution through multiple charts, enhancing their business operations and decision-making.
• Tools used: Spring Cloud 2022.0.0-RC2, Spring Security Keycloak, Docker Docker-compose, and Angular 13 to develop and deploy the application.
• Designed and implemented a microservices-based architecture that makes the application highly efficient, flexible, and resilient, allowing it to handle large volumes of traffic while maintaining an excellent user experience. • Created multiple search filters for users to find the ideal rental car, improving the application’s usability and convenience. • Developed a dashboard that helps the owner easily manage resources and track rent evolution through multiple charts, enhancing their business operations and decision-making. • Tools used: Spring Cloud 2022.0.0-RC2, Spring Security Keycloak, Docker Docker-compose, and Angular 13 to develop and deploy the application.

Ismail-Ecom is a complete E-commerce web application that covers all actions required on an E-commerce web apps. It provides 4 interfaces: 
* Client interface
* Admin interface
* Admin interface provided by keycloak for handling employees and profile settings .
* Admin interface provided by PayPal for handling transactions
